name: Frank & Mark
overview: Frank & Mark is a platform game. During the holidays twin brothers Frank and Mark come across a castle. The owner of the castle was a wizard Rabus. In the old days Rabus dealt with kidnapping people for ransom. Curious about the story, Mark went to the castle and disappeared. Concerned, Frank goes to the castle to find his brother. During the trip Frank travels the castle, garden and underground. To reach the brother, the player needs to collect items and use them in the right places, avoiding encountered enemies and obstacles.
